about_the_game:
As a newly graduated young doctor, are you ready to take on the ultimate survival challenge in the chaotic world of healthcare? Respond to emergencies, save lives, climb the ranks from a medical tent to a major hospital, and ultimately shape the future of the healthcare system as a hospital administrator!

Every decision you make, every action you take, will determine the fate of your patients. Waking up in an ambulance, you must diagnose illnesses, apply the correct treatments, perform life-saving surgeries, and make critical strategic choices in high-pressure situations.

Key Features

🚑 Realistic Medical Procedures – From first aid and diagnostics to surgeries and patient management, experience an in-depth medical simulation.

🏥 Career Progression – Start in a medical tent, handle cases in a health center, become a specialist doctor, and rise to the rank of chief physician!

⚕️ Critical Decisions & Life-Saving Interventions – Manage resources wisely, race against time, and shape the future of your hospital while saving lives.

🚁 Ambulance & Helicopter Missions – Respond to emergency cases, transport critical patients, and perform organ transplants with high-risk helicopter missions.

👥 Staff & Hospital Management – Train assistant doctors, plan shifts, expand hospital capacity, and optimize resource allocation.

🏗 Hospital Expansion & Management – Upgrade hospital departments, invest in medical equipment, manage energy consumption, and ensure financial stability while providing the best healthcare.

In this highly realistic and strategic medical simulation, test your doctor skills across emergency rooms, operating theaters, health centers, and large hospitals. The fate of countless patients is in your hands—make the right decisions, manage the health crisis, and rise as a medical leader!

Become the hope for your patients! 🏥🚑🔥

content_descriptors.notes: Since the game is about medicine and health, there is a mechanic of taking blood from the patient for analysis.

name: MediSim: Emergency Response

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 /AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: As a young doctor, save lives in emergencies, advance from a health center to a major hospital, and manage your own facility. Perform first aid, and diagnostics, take on ambulance and helicopter missions, and build your medical team. A realistic medical simulation where every decision matters!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Swedish, Hindi
*languages with full audio support
